name: Get out of my Vampire Castle!
name_original: Get out of my Vampire Castle!
description:
GET OUT OF MY VAMPIRE CASTLE! VAMPIRE LADY VS. KILLER ROBOTS

What? After your vacations there are Killer Robots in your lovely vampire castle. You are the vampire lady and you have a job to do!

Vampire Castle is the new game by Mark van der Hell and Zirbeldrüsen Games. After the worldwide success of Rokko Lambodgi vs. Killer Zombies, Zirbeldrüsen Games presents GET OUT OF MY VAMPIRE CASTLE - VAMPIRE LADY VS. KILLER ROBOTS! Play and enjoy!! Nice retro action game for classic arcade lovers.

Play the vampire lady with your gamepad (Any Button to fire) or with your keyboard (Button A to fire).

Graphix by Mark van der Hell, free  characters  by  ASCII  RPG  Maker  2000, sprites  by  Bruno R.Marcos , Cyber  Woman  by  Myriam  Eleatell , Vampire  Lady  by  jsks, Zombie  by  brgfx, Slime  Cave  by  brgfx, Vampire  Castle  Image  by  upklyak.

Sounds  and  Music  by  Bruno R.Marcos  and  ARCADE  GAME  STUDIO.

Sounds  on  freesound.org by michel88, mikesh, the-baron, shawnyboy, projectsu012, rhodesmas, eardeer, mobeyee, tissman, ryusa, robinhood76, eminyildirim, derplayer, cjspellsfish, nlux

Music  on  freemusicarchive.org by HoliznaCC0 and Eggy Toast.

Zirbeldrüsen Games 2022

For best graphic display make it fullscreen!
